snippet: Marco Fabian and Luis Montes scored 13 minutes apart in the first half as Mexico beat Martinique. Mexico moved on despite losing its first pool match to Panama.
abstract: Mexico beats Martinique, 3-1, and advances to Concacaf Gold Cup quarterfinals in  Denver; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marco Fabian and Luis Montes scored 13 minutes apart in the first half as Mexico beat Martinique. Mexico moved on despite losing its first pool match to Panama.

headline.main: Mexico Advances to Gold Cup Quarterfinals
